name: Query with variables
body: {"query": "query GetUser($id: ID!) { user(id: $id) { name email role } }", "variables": {"id": "123"}}

name: Nested query
body: {"query": "query { user(id: 123) { name posts { title comments { text author { name } } } } }"}

name: Query with fragments
body: {"query": "fragment UserInfo on User { name email } query { user(id: 123) { ...UserInfo } }"}
